review: I was very apprehensive when I had to change Doctors due to certain issues. I feel we found the right Dr in Dr. Shilpa Dinesh as she is very patient in hearing our issues and providing crisp advices on how to handle situations related to our baby. She is very approachable and friendly and displays her knowledge with a down to earth attitude. Happy to say that we found a doctor who is really helpful and caring!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor treated my baby in great manner . 
But just to revisit next day of discharge hospital charged me 400 , same medication  continued , Pediatric consultation next day sfter discharge should be free,my opinion. Duty nurses should not carry their personal mobiles in hospitals .
reply_text: Thank you.. I shall pass on your suggestion to the hospital management
